Title: Nancy Drew
Genre: Comedy, Crime, Family, Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Writer: Andrew Fleming (screenplay), Tiffany Paulsen (screenplay), Tiffany Paulsen (story), Mildred Wirt Benson (characters)
Actors: Emma Roberts, Craig Gellis, Rich Cooper, Max Thieriot
Plot: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.
